pkgmetadata.longdescription: Stochastic Data Envelopment Analysis // Set of functions for Stochastic Data Envelopment Analysis. Chance constrained versions of radial, directional and additive DEA models are implemented, as long as super-efficiency models. See: Cooper, W.W.; Deng, H.; Huang, Z.; Li, S.X. (2002). doi:10.1057/palgrave.jors.2601433, Bols, V.J.; Bentez, R.; Coll-Serrano, V. (2024) doi:10.1016/j.orp.2024.100307.
